typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Movies
Movies select(mapColumn(
		rating
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Ratings
Ratings keyGenerate(output(MovieRatingSK as integer),
	startAt: 1L) ~> MovieRatingSK
MovieRatingSK derive(MovieRatingSK = toInteger(MovieRatingSK)) ~> ConvertionMoviRatingSK
ConvertionMoviRatingSK sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		MovieRatingSK
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimRatings
